benefitStatements.nutrient: Science sets apart Mosaic’s performance crop nutrition products and produces bigger yields and greater ROI for you. Insight, research, innovation and proven performance helps you get more out of every acre.
benefitStatements.soil: As the leader in crop nutrition, Mosaic invests in research and innovative products to unlock a farm’s fullest potential. Our biological products enhance the relationship between soil and crop nutrients to boost crop revenue potential.

performanceAcre.paragraph: Combining Mosaic products achieves balanced crop nutrition. Streamline blend time and improve blend accuracy. Maximize yields and increase ROI.

relevantNutrients.title: Explore nutrients
relevantNutrients.paragraphPartA: Click on a nutrient to understand its role and value in helping your

nutrient.title: Calculate your nutrient removal
nutrient.paragraph: Select crop and yield to discover what deficiencies might be lacking in your field.

microessentials.title: Calculate your ROI with MicroEssentials®
microessentials.paragraph: How much can you expect to get for your crop?

aspire.title: Calculate your ROI with Aspire®
aspire.paragraph: How much can you expect to get for your crop?

aspire.title: The power of boron
aspire.paragraph: Two forms of boron and potassium in one granule, uniform distribution, and spring or fall application available all season.
aspire.name: Aspire

microessentials.title: Proven to perform
microessentials.paragraph: One nutritionally balanced granule provides uniform distribution of phosphorus, zinc and two forms of sulfur to last all season
microessentials.name: MicroEssentials

k-mag.title: Three balanced nutrients
k-mag.paragraph: Crop-friendly potassium, magnesium and sulfur to help every plant reach its full potential.
k-mag.name: K-Mag

pegasus.title: Formulated for pure results
pegasus.paragraph: Pure white potash provides lower insolubles and impurities for more uniform blending and application.
pegasus.name: Pegasus

biopath.title: Liquid Bio Crop Nutrition
biopath.paragraph: BioPath® is a biological fertilizer complement formulated with proven strains of PGPR that increases nutrient availability, uptake, and utilization and improves early-season plant growth and vigor, optimizing yield potential in crops. As a liquid biological, it can be pre-blended with liquid fertilizers or easily tank-mixed and applied at plant, sidedress, topdress or through fertigation.
biopath.name: BioPath

powercoat.title: Get More Out Of Fertilizers
powercoat.paragraph: PowerCoat® is the perfect complement for dry fertilizers that improves nutrient utilization for greater plant growth and vigor, helping maximize ROI from fertilizer inputs. PowerCoat comes in liquid form to coat granular fertilizer and is an economical biological option for banded or broadcast applications.
powercoat.name: PowerCoat

manage.title: Organic Bio Crop Nutrition
manage.paragraph: Manage™ is an organic biological fertilizer complement formulated with proven strains of PGPR — Plant Growth Promoting Rhizobacteria — that increases nutrient availability, uptake, and utilization and improves early-season plant growth and vigor, optimizing yield potential. Manage is a dry soluble formulation for liquid applications and is approved for organic production.
manage.name: Manage

refirma-hydraguard.title: Mitigates Abiotic Stress
refirma-hydraguard.paragraph: Refirma HydraGuard™ is a liquid bio crop stimulant that carries a 0-3-3 analysis and contains an osmolyte compound naturally produced by plants when they are under abiotic stress (heat, drought or salinity) as a coping mechanism. The exogenous application of Refirma™ HydraGuard™ to plants reproduces and enhances this natural response, helping to preserve growth and physiological processes and reducing the impact of the abiotic stress on the plant.
refirma-hydraguard.name: Refirma™ HydraGuard™

root-honey-plus.title: Stronger Roots, Stronger Plants
root-honey-plus.paragraph: Root Honey™ Plus is a premium 1-0-1 liquid bionutrient containing amino acids derived from oilseed extract, carbohydrates, high-grade fulvic acid and kelp. It is fortified with bioactives of PGPR — Plant Growth Promoting Rhizobacteria. This ingredient-rich formulation increases microbial growth and activity and improves nutrient availability, lending to a more robust root system and optimizing plant growth and vigor.
root-honey-plus.name: Root Honey Plus 1-0-1
